text: erricalu kavvamune `ale-nnisai bima feddale-llahu ba`dahum `ala ba`div vebima enfeku min emvalihim. fessalihatu kanitatun hafizatul lilgaybi bima hafiza-llah. vellati tehafune nusuzehunne fe`izuhunne vehcuruhunne fi-lmedaci`i vadribuhunn. fein eta`nekum fela tebgu `aleyhinne sebila. inne-llahe kane `aliyyen kebira
